question: What is the meaning of the name Kṛṣṇa?
All-attractive.
answer: Yes. So unless God is all-attractive, how can He be God? A man is important when he is attractive. Is it not?

question: It is so.
answer: So, God must be attractive, and attractive for all. Therefore, if God has any name, or if you want to give any name to God, only “Kṛṣṇa” can be given.
